sentence.text: Primary macronodular adrenal hyperplasia (PMAH), also known in the past as bilateral macronodular adrenalhyperplasia or adrenocorticotropin (negative regulation of tumor necrosis factor production)-independent macronodular adrenal hyperplasia, is a rare muscle organ development of Cushing's syndrome (CS) and is associated with bilateralenlargement of the adrenal glands.

entity.text: negative regulation of tumor necrosis factor production

sentence.text: In addition, haploid clone of tumor DNA was confirmed by germline mutation and somaticmutation, which suggested the pathogenic mechanism of "two-hit-model." biological_process was the causative gene of AIMAH pedigrees.
